sys_element_mapping.value:
Hii ,  Trigger➛Clients Hotel Booking Record➛Hotel Booking For➛First name This is to Confirm yoy that your Booking State has Set to Trigger➛Clients Hotel Booking Record➛Booking State , Your Check In Date is Trigger➛Clients Hotel Booking Record➛CheckIn Date and Time and your Check Out Date is Trigger➛Clients Hotel Booking Record➛CheckOut Date and Time for the Reason Trigger➛Clients Hotel Booking Record➛Booking Reasonhas been confirmed !! 

Thanks!!
